Math is a built-in Lua library which contains mathematical functions and constants that you can use in scripts.

* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.abs math.abs]
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.acos math.acos]
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.asin math.asin]
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.atan math.atan]
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.atan2 math.atan2]
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.ceil math.ceil]
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.cos math.cos]  
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.cosh math.cosh]
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.deg math.deg]
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.exp math.exp]
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.floor math.floor]
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.fmod math.fmod]
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.frexp math.frexp]
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.huge math.huge] (constant)
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.ldexp math.ldexp]
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.log math.log]
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.log10 math.log10]
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.max math.max]
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.min math.min]
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.modf math.modf]
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.pi math.pi] (constant)
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.pow math.pow]
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.rad math.rad]
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.random math.random]
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.randomseed math.randomseed]
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.sin math.sin]
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.sinh math.sinh]
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.sqrt math.sqrt]
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.tanh math.tanh]
* [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-math.tan math.tan]
